last_episode_to_air.name: Leaving Orlando (3)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hayden, Luther and Dauber return to Minnesota State, where they reminisce about their college-coaching years and see some familiar faces. Later, at the lake with Christine and Tim, Hayden shares his vision of the family's futureâ€”an idea she quickly embraces.

name: Coach
overview: Hayden Fox, the curmudgeonly coach of Minnesota State University's Screaming Eagles football team, tries to navigate his way through the sports world, fatherhood and family life without dropping the ball.

episodes.name: Kelly and the Professor
episodes.overview: Kelly tells Hayden she had a date with a faculty member, and he wants to know who.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Kelly's return to Minnesota for college awakens Hayden's paternal instincts, disrupting his relationship with Christine

episodes.name: Kelly, Meet Christine
episodes.overview: Christine demands Hayden be truthful with Kelly about their relationship.

episodes.name: I'm in Love with a Boy Named Stuart
episodes.overview: Hayden detests Kelly's new boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Loss Weekend
episodes.overview: A losing streak makes Hayden unpleasant company for Christine.

episodes.name: Gambling for Meat
episodes.overview: Hayden suspends Luther for 30 days for gambling when he bets against the team and wins a steak at the Touchdown Club; but Luther think he has been fired, and takes another job.

episodes.name: 19 Candles
episodes.overview: Hayden plans a quiet birthday celebration for Kelly, who invites Stuart.

episodes.name: Parents' Weekend
episodes.overview: Christine is seized by an uncontrollable urge to get a look at Hayden's ex-wife, who's come up for Parents' Weekend.

episodes.name: I'm Sorry I Told You My Wife Was Dead
episodes.overview: Hayden consoles a wealthy alumnus' widow to secure a substantial donation.

episodes.name: Define Romance
episodes.overview: Hayden feels threatened when Christine dates another.

episodes.name: Whose Team Is It, Anyway?
episodes.overview: Although Hayden needs a victory in his last game for a winning season, he may be forced to bench his star player for skipping practice.

episodes.name: Hoot, Hoot Hike
episodes.overview: The poetry of football is turned into ballet by Kelly's dance instructor, who envisions a pas de deux with technical advisor Hayden.

episodes.name: Dauber's Blow-Out
episodes.overview: Anti-fun Riley Pringle of the Conduct Committee joins Hayden in supervising Dauber's season-ending party.

episodes.name: I Don't Know Much About Art, But I Know What Makes Me Mad
episodes.overview: Hayden dislikes art; Christine dislikes his attitude.

episodes.name: Dauber's Got a Girl
episodes.overview: Hayden feuds with the girls' basketball coach, Dauber's new flame.

episodes.name: Bring Me the Head of Stuart Rosebrock (1)
episodes.overview: Hayden unwittingly splits Kelly and Stuart when he reluctantly accepts a dinner invitation and enjoys the floor show supplied by the bickering couple.

episodes.name: If a Coach Falls in the Woods (2)
episodes.overview: Hayden runs away to protest Kelly's wedding to Stuart.

episodes.name: If Keith Jackson Calls, I'll Be at My Therapist's
episodes.overview: Game pressure gives Hayden a facial tic before a national telecast.

episodes.name: I'm in the Mood for Luther
episodes.overview: Christine fixes Luther up with a friend.

episodes.name: A Man and a Woman (and Two Theater Majors)
episodes.overview: Bickering Kelly and Stuart invade Christine and Hayden's intimate weekend.

episodes.name: The Investment
episodes.overview: After Hayden convinces Luther to invest in the Touchdown Club, an opening night mishap threatens their partnership and their friendship when Luther is forced to call Hayden after a robbery.

episodes.name: I've Got a Secret
episodes.overview: When Hayden secretly recruits a top quarterback, Christine blabs to a sportscaster.

episodes.name: The Curley O'Brien Award
episodes.overview: Hayden plans a victory party for an anticipated award.

episodes.name: The Rosebrocks of Wisconsin
episodes.overview: When Hayden objects to Kelly spending all her time in Wisconsin with her new family, Kelly forces her father to meet her in-laws.

episodes.name: Coaches Conference
episodes.overview: Hayden meets his idols at a conference, but his dreams of swimming with the big fishes drown in a sea of anonymity.

episodes.name: Carnival Knowledge
episodes.overview: Coach Watkins gets revenge on Hayden when he mans a booth at the college carnival.

episodes.name: Haven't I Slept with You Somewhere Before?
episodes.overview: Hayden believes the new president of Minnesota State is a woman with whom he once had a fling.

episodes.name: Homewreckers
episodes.overview: Hayden seeks Luther's companionship while Christine works on the weekend, and while she is away nearly destroys her apartment.

episodes.name: Professor Doolittle
episodes.overview: Hayden enrolls his team in the academic class he's been required to teach, and sets out to make it ""the easiest history class in history.""

episodes.name: Sunshine on My Shoulder Makes Me Happy: A Show About Bird Ransom
episodes.overview: Hayden loses Luther's prized bird while the assistant coach vacations.

episodes.name: Kelly Girl
episodes.overview: Hayden is pleased when Kelly volunteers to fill in for his vacationing secretary.

episodes.name: A Jerk at the Opera
episodes.overview: When Hayden refuses to accompany Christine to the opera, she asks her old flame, and a predictably jealous Hayden follows them in disguise.

episodes.name: Poodle Springs
episodes.overview: Hayden impresses Judy's parents when he saves their pet poodle.

episodes.name: That Shouldn't Happen
episodes.overview: Hayden, ecstatic about his team being ranked top-20 for the first time, meets Christine's mother, then is shattered when his star player Bo is hurt and put on the injured list.

episodes.name: Magnificent Abscession
episodes.overview: When Hayden has to miss a game because of a bad tooth, Luther must coach via phone instructions from him.

episodes.name: The Day That Moses Came to Town
episodes.overview: Hayden gets jealous when the university president woos a basketball coach from Boston with promises of grandiose perks.

episodes.name: Is This Your First Time on the Riverboat, Miss Watkins?
episodes.overview: Hayden reluctantly allows archrival Watkins to sit in on his poker night.

episodes.name: Hayden's in the Kitchen with Dinah
episodes.overview: Hayden promises to stay with a bedridden Christine, rather than attend a long-awaited team victory celebration.

episodes.name: Hayden and Luther's Excellent Adventure
episodes.overview: Hayden and Luther get stranded out of town the night Hayden is to escort Christine to an awards banquet in her honor.

episodes.name: The Break-Up
episodes.overview: Hayden forsakes football with the guys to meet Christine's antique-dealer friend.

episodes.name: The Iceman Goeth
episodes.overview: Even at a victory party, and with Elaine trying to seduce him, Hayden remains depressed over his breakup with Christine.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: Christine wants all her belongings out of Hayden's house, and Luther might move in next door.

episodes.name: Men Don't Heal
episodes.overview: Irritable over his breakup with Christine, Hayden attends a self-help group.

episodes.name: When Hayden Met Christine
episodes.overview: Dateless for a charity ball, Hayden flashes back four years to when he first met Christine, at the same affair.

episodes.name: Christmas Brains
episodes.overview: Grinch Hayden's ex-wife unexpectedly shows up at his holiday party with a gift idea that will make all his Christmases merry: she helps him decide to reunite with Christine.

episodes.name: Dauber Graduates
episodes.overview: When Dauber finally graduates after eight years, Hayden promotes him to full-time coach, and their relationship changes.

episodes.name: Puppy Love
episodes.overview: Hayden concocts a wild tale to keep a promised $10 million donation from going to the basketball department instead.

episodes.name: The Marion Kind (1)
episodes.overview: Christine persuades Luther to have lunch with the reconciling best friend who stole his girl 37 years ago.

episodes.name: The Marion Kind (2)
episodes.overview: When Luther's old friend steals his girlfriend again, Hayden and Peter try to spare Luther's feelings by hiding the fact.

episodes.name: Leonard Kraleman: All-American
episodes.overview: Hayden tries to discourage a scrawny, unpopular student who wants to try out for the football team, and Christine schools him in the art of gaining popularity.

episodes.name: 2 BRs, MTN VW
episodes.overview: Whiny, well-meaning Stuart nearly drives Hayden to murder on a ski trip with Christine and Kelly.

episodes.name: Hurley-Burleigh
episodes.overview: On his first trip to Las Vegas, athletic director Howard wants to sow some wild oats.

episodes.name: Hayden Fox for Universal Jocks
episodes.overview: When Hayden discovers Christine's salary dwarfs his own, he decides to make extra cash as a spokesperson for an athletic supporter company.

episodes.name: A Father and Son Reunion
episodes.overview: Hayden reunites Luther and his long-lost father.

episodes.name: Diamonds Are a Dentist's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Cash-poor Hayden buys Christine's engagement ring from a cut-rate jeweler/dentist.

episodes.name: The Kick-off and the Kiss-off
episodes.overview: Hayden's photograph appears on the cover of Sports Illustrated after his team is ranked in the top 20.

episodes.name: Since My Beaver Left Me
episodes.overview: Hayden tries to console Kelly, who would rather tell it to Christine.

episodes.name: Don't Get Mad, Get Cooley
episodes.overview: Convinced that Hayden deliberately sold him a broken-down truck, Luther reports Hayden to a TV consumer reporter.

episodes.name: A Real Guy's Guy
episodes.overview: Hayden pressures Kelly to date his star player, whom she finds very attractive -- until he tells her he is gay.

episodes.name: Any Place I Hang Myself Is Home
episodes.overview: Hayden grudgingly agrees to go house hunting with Christine, then buys a house without consulting her.

episodes.name: Requiem for a Groundskeeper
episodes.overview: Hayden receives an oddball inheritance from an acquaintance.

episodes.name: I Think I Can't, I Think I Can't
episodes.overview: Hayden and Luther spend an excruciating trip snowbound in a cramped train compartment after Luther trades in their plane tickets following a dream about an air crash.

episodes.name: I Hate Barbara
episodes.overview: Hayden regrets his honesty when he tells Christine he hates her friend.

episodes.name: Loonstruck
episodes.overview: The call of the loon forebodes more than Hayden expected when he agrees to speak at Burleigh's Fraternal Order of the Loon.

episodes.name: The Pineapple Bowl (1)
episodes.overview: Hayden is beaten before he plays his first bowl game when he learns the opposing coach is his former mentor.

episodes.name: The Pineapple Bowl (2)
episodes.overview: Hayden halts pre-game hoopla after a star player is injured in a bizarre limo accident.

episodes.name: Rizzendough Revisited
episodes.overview: Hayden vies with Watkins for a benefactor's favor and her donations by leading an exercise class for seniors.

episodes.name: Return of the Marriage Killer
episodes.overview: Hayden reveals secrets about his ex-wife Beth when her new fiancé asks him for advice.

episodes.name: War of the Dopes
episodes.overview: A careless comment results in a food fight when Dauber moves into Luther's apartment building.

episodes.name: The Woodchuck, the Beaver and the Fox: A Menage a Trois
episodes.overview: Kelly is the one surprised at Grandpa Rosebrock's 90th birthday party when Stuart arrives with his new girlfriend.

episodes.name: No Good Deed Goes Unpunished
episodes.overview: When an arrogant chauvinist millionaire insults his girlfriend in public, Hayden and Christine come to her defense.

episodes.name: Last of the Red-Hot Luthers
episodes.overview: After a one-night stand with Hayden's 60-year-old secretary, Luther is too ashamed to face her the next morning.

episodes.name: The Old Fish and the Shoes
episodes.overview: Christine sells Hayden's Johnny Unitas-autographed football shoes; Luther catches the biggest pike in the lake only to lose it.

episodes.name: Dateline-Bangkok
episodes.overview: Kelly falls for a correspondent stationed in Bangkok; Luther is upset because he thinks he's shrinking.

episodes.name: If That's Opportunity, Don't Answer
episodes.overview: A network job offer poses Christine a dilemma: to stay in Minnesota with Hayden or move to New York.

episodes.name: Frequent Flyers, Crossed Wires
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine have conflicting commitments when a network premiere party is scheduled the same night as Hayden's sports banquet, at which he hopes to receive the coveted Curly O'Brien award. Out of the confusion arise a pair of resolutions: Christine decides to stay in Minnesota, while Hayden decides to move to New York to be with Christine.

episodes.name: Can We Go Home Now?
episodes.overview: The stress of a long-distance relationship troubles Hayden; Luther and Dauber refinish Hayden's game-room floor. Finally the Hayden-Christine problem is resolved when she loses her network job and returns to Minnesota.

episodes.name: To Air Is Human
episodes.overview: Hayden wins his first football game of the year and proposes to Christine on his new live television show.

episodes.name: Big Brother, Little Brain
episodes.overview: Dauber's relationship with his girlfriend Judy is threatened when he becomes a Big Brother to an 8-year-old.

episodes.name: Father of the Year
episodes.overview: Hayden hires Kelly's roommate to act as his daughter when Kelly refuses to attend his Father of the Year banquet.

episodes.name: Born Luther
episodes.overview: Luther complains to Hayden about the lack of recognition for his contribution to the team's success -- then must face the media when the team loses.

episodes.name: Shirley Burleigh, Girlie Friday
episodes.overview: Howard's wife Shirley comes to work in the athletic department as his temporary secretary and drives him crazy; Luther and Dauber fight to keep their favorite cereal alive.

episodes.name: Rizzendough Rendezvous
episodes.overview: Hayden's enthusiasm for fund-raising threatens Luther's romance with wealthy widow Mrs. Rizzendough.

episodes.name: Love Me Tender
episodes.overview: Luther reveals his true opinion of Christine following a close brush with death.

episodes.name: The Bachelor Party
episodes.overview: Johnny Unitas, Dick Butkus and Bubba Smith upset Luther when they host Hayden's bachelor party.

episodes.name: Dresswreckers
episodes.overview: Christine's plans for a perfect wedding go from bad to worse after Luther sets her wedding dress on fire.

episodes.name: Vows
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine marry in her childhood home.

episodes.name: The Patriot Bowl
episodes.overview: Hayden's team plays in the Patriot Bowl under horrendous conditions.

episodes.name: My True Love Gave to Me...
episodes.overview: Hayden's and Dauber's gifts to the women in their lives accidentally get switched -- and Judy thinks Dauber is proposing to her when she unwraps Christine's ring.

episodes.name: The Commercial (1)
episodes.overview: Hayden is set to star in a coffee commercial with Christine, but his part is recast; Luther decides to write a screenplay.

episodes.name: The Commercial (2)
episodes.overview: Hayden tries to restrain his jealousy over Christine's on-air romance with her new co-star in the coffee commercial.

episodes.name: Buzzy Money
episodes.overview: Hayden is thrilled when Kelly receives a large check from her ex-husband, until he learns her plans for the money.

episodes.name: Vegas Odds
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine impulsively decide to get married while spending the weekend with Luther in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Burden of the Burleighs
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine are driven crazy when Howard and Shirley decide to become their best friends.

episodes.name: The Bigger They Are
episodes.overview: One of Hayden's former football players is forced into early retirement because of a surprising medical problem, despite his very real knee injuries; the real reason is cancer.

episodes.name: Luthario
episodes.overview: Luther begins questioning the relationship when his romance with Lorraine heats up.

episodes.name: Dirty Tricks
episodes.overview: Judy threatens to quit coaching at Minnesota State when Hayden plays one last practical joke on her during an important ceremony.

episodes.name: About Face
episodes.overview: Hayden tries to convince Christine that she does not need a face-lift to improve her chances in a job search.

episodes.name: Why So Happy, Hayden?
episodes.overview: Hayden attempts to recruit Tyler Roberts, the country's top high-school football player from Note Dame.

episodes.name: One for the Road
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine's third attempt to get married includes plans for a wedding in the woods in a church that's due for demolition.

episodes.name: Baby on Board?
episodes.overview: Hayden is rattled as he tries to nurse his new team to victory, even as Christine announces she wants to have a baby.

episodes.name: Belly of the Beast
episodes.overview: Hayden stands up in court for Luther's defendant dog Quincy, who bit the MSU bandleader; Christine dozes during Hayden's advances.

episodes.name: Nice Job If You Can Get It
episodes.overview: Hayden's overactive ego has him convinced that Christine's success is not her own doing.

episodes.name: The Luck Stops Here
episodes.overview: Luther and Hayden have vastly different views on the reasons for the team's success.

episodes.name: If She Can Make It There...
episodes.overview: Kelly's desire to work in New York upsets Hayden.

episodes.name: Uneasy Riders
episodes.overview: Hayden and Dauber buy motorcycles.

episodes.name: Piece O' Cake
episodes.overview: Luther, feeling a bit lonely, befriends a boy (Smollett) in need of a father

episodes.name: Running on Empty
episodes.overview: Christine gingerly suggests that she and Hayden visit a fertility clinic.

episodes.name: It Came from New York
episodes.overview: Kelly, having taken a bite out of the Big Apple, comes home for Thanksgiving a changed woman -- one that Hayden doesn't particularly like.

episodes.name: The Playbook
episodes.overview: The playbook falls into enemy hands on the eve of Hayden's biggest game.

episodes.name: The Pioneer Bowl
episodes.overview: On the day of the Pioneer Bowl, an accident puts Luther in the hospital with a concussion -- but the team wins the National Championship anyway.

episodes.name: Christmas of the Van Damned
episodes.overview: Luther makes a nuisance of himself after tracing his family tree and learning of a large group of Van Dams living in the area.

episodes.name: The Babywreckers
episodes.overview: Hayden is rattled when he and Christine agree to watch an infant for the weekend.

episodes.name: Coach for a Day (1)
episodes.overview: Luther is offered the job of head football coach at nearby small Aberdeen college.

episodes.name: Coach for a Day (2)
episodes.overview: Luther is embarrassed to confess his new job: managing a miniature golf course.

episodes.name: My Cup Runneth Over
episodes.overview: Hayden begins wearing a special device to increase his sperm count. As a Valentine's gift he goes on Christine's TV show, where his special device leaks on camera.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Daughter
episodes.overview: Kelly can't attend when Hayden goes to New York to receive the Coach of the Year award.

episodes.name: The Devil in Mrs. Burleigh
episodes.overview: While Howard and Hayden are away at a conference, Shirley confides in Christine that she's become attracted to another man.

episodes.name: Blue Chip Blues
episodes.overview: The Screaming Eagles try to recruit the nations top QB. The players father roomed with Haden in college. After a one on one conversation with the blue chips QB, the player admits he only plays ball to please his eager father whose own football dreams were crushed by an injury. Haden convinces to give the young perspective time to decide his own life direction.

episodes.name: The Stand-In
episodes.overview: Fed up with trying to increase his fertility, Hayden looks into getting a sperm donor -- quarterback Troy Aikman.

episodes.name: Something Old, Something New
episodes.overview: An old girlfriend's visit rekindles Dauber's feelings and jeopardizes his relationship with Judy.

episodes.name: One of the Guys
episodes.overview: Christine goes fishing with the guys and catches the biggest fish.

episodes.name: My Best Friend's Girl
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine have lukewarm reactions to Luther's outrageously uninhibited date.

episodes.name: Goodbye, Mr. Putts
episodes.overview: In this episode Judy and three of the other woman's coaches challenge Hayden, Dauber, Howard and Luther to a game of golf with the winner getting the best athletic parking spots. The only problem for the guys is that Luther is a terrible player, after some argument Hayden finally relents to give Luther a shot against the woman. The men are poised to win on a put by Hayden, but he misses.

episodes.name: Head Like a Wheel
episodes.overview: On his 49th birthday, Hayden wants to drive a race car.

episodes.name: Retrospective (1)
episodes.overview: This is an unusual greatest moments episode. The format is an interview with Hayden about his life and work at Minnesota State. In the first of this two part series Mary Hart interviews Hayden about the beginnings of his relationship with Christine. Another unusual part of this episode is its absence of a laugh track, leaving the jokes to push themselves.

episodes.name: Retrospective (2)
episodes.overview: In this second of the two-part interview with Mary Hart, the show explores Hayden's relationships with the other significant people in his life (i.e. Luther, Dauber, Howard, and his daughter). This two-part series is essentially a greatest moments episode from the first six seasons.

episodes.name: Pros & Cons
episodes.overview: Hayden is offered a position at an unnamed pro team. He goes to New York to interview for the job. After first finding out about the offer, he doesn't tell Dauber or Luther. Finally he does and everyone becomes excited about a future in the NFL. Unfortunately Hayden is not offered the job. The show ends with Christine and Hayden discussing their unrelenting ambition that leaves them restless in Minnesota.

episodes.name: It Should Happen to You
episodes.overview: Hayden hires an image consultant who sets out to make him a superstar.

episodes.name: Graceless Under Fire
episodes.overview: Hayden's image consultant Susan Miller gets underfoot when he coaches the team.

episodes.name: Judy's Turn
episodes.overview: In this Dauber centered episode, Judy returns from Romania after a trip with the woman's basketball team. Dauber is exited to see her, as it's the longest time they've ever been apart (one month). When Judy arrives, she tells Dauber that she had an affair with a Romanian man named Andre. Judy doesn't feels she can spend her life with Dauber, she breaks their two-year engagement.

episodes.name: Above and Beyond the Call of Hayden
episodes.overview: Luther spends more time with Ruthanne and less with Hayden.

episodes.name: Inconceivable
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine have a major marital blowup over her seeming ""impregnability"" and the consequent mechanical nature of their recent love life. Luther gets into an unbelievable car deal with an elderly woman.

episodes.name: Jailbirds
episodes.overview: Against Hayden's advice, Christine attends a bachelorette party thrown by Ruthanne and gets into trouble.

episodes.name: My Fair Agent
episodes.overview: Hayden blames Christine for his sexist attitude toward an attractive co-worker.

episodes.name: Be a Good Sport
episodes.overview: Cuts in the non-football athletic budget force Hayden into a televised debate.

episodes.name: Working Girl
episodes.overview: Carter gives Bill Jennings an audition tape of one of his beautiful broadcasting students. Carter intends to replace Christine with a young female host to "freshen up the show." Carter's plan backfires as Jennings decides to replace him instead of Christine. In the midst of Hayden's celebration on Carter's firing, Carter shows up to beg Christine to help him get his job back. Christine agrees and the next morning talks with the Jennings to help Carter. In the midst of the meeting Carter bursts into the meeting and with Christine's aid he gets his job back.

episodes.name: Out of Control
episodes.overview: An opposing player is badly hurt after Hayden encourages rough play.

episodes.name: The Popcorn Bowl
episodes.overview: Just before a big bowl game, a rumor breaks out that Hayden may be taking a job in the pros.

episodes.name: Luther and Ruthanne Take the Big 12 Steps
episodes.overview: Luther and Ruthanne try to help each other shed bad habits.

episodes.name: Did Someone Call Me Snorer?
episodes.overview: Hayden refuses to go quietly when Christine insists that he head off his snoring problem with a trip to a sleep therapy clinic.

episodes.name: Close Encounters of the Worst Kind
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine agree to work out their marital problems via an anonymous ""encounter weekend"" for couples, but the entire process breaks down for Hayden once Howard and Shirley Burleigh join the group.

episodes.name: The Kicker
episodes.overview: A letter from a European prospect inspires Hayden to go on an international recruiting trip -- to a country that's under martial law.

episodes.name: The Walk-On
episodes.overview: Hayden refuses to admit that a middle-aged prospect might be too old to play on the team, and becomes his biggest supporter.

episodes.name: Call Me Cupid
episodes.overview: A Valentine's Day dinner gives three couples heartburn when Hayden's efforts to fix up a lovelorn Dauber entirely miss their mark.

episodes.name: Johnsonwreckers
episodes.overview: Hayden tries to befriend former Dallas Cowboys coach Jimmy Johnson -- but his efforts go to the dogs when Johnson's Super Bowl ring is eaten by Luther's dog.

episodes.name: The Day I Met Frank Gifford
episodes.overview: Luther feels left out when Hayden and Christine are invited to New York for a dinner honoring Frank Gifford.

episodes.name: Kelly's New Guy (1)
episodes.overview: When Hayden's daughter Kelly brings home new boyfriend Peter, Hayden is appalled to learn that Peter is the same age as Hayden.

episodes.name: Kelly's New Guy (2)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Dauber decide to keep their relationship a secret from Hayden, but fate throws a monkey wrench into their plans.

episodes.name: Ten Percent of Nothing
episodes.overview: Luther risks losing agent Art Hibke by making a self-arranged promotional appearance without telling Art -- and then refusing to pay his commission, which leads to a crazed dental drilling; Dauber tries a new image.

episodes.name: Oh, a Pro Job (1)
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine go on a Caribbean cruise to get away from it all, but can't seem to steer clear of a wealthy eccentric, who makes a surprising offer.

episodes.name: Oh, a Pro Job (2)
episodes.overview: Hayden is tempted by an offer to coach a professional team, but fears that its eccentric owner would make all the big decisions herself.

episodes.name: Is It Hot In Here, or Is It Me? (1)
episodes.overview: Hayden leaves Minnesota for a new job as coach of an NFL team in Orlando, Florida. When he arrives, he finds that the team's owner has a game plan of her own.

episodes.name: Is It Hot In Here, or Is It Me? (2)
episodes.overview: Hayden tries to win over both Doris and the press while readying the Breakers for their first game.

episodes.name: Fool for Lunch
episodes.overview: Luther bites off more than he can chew when he moves into a new apartment -- in a seniors-only community -- and three women compete for his attentions.

episodes.name: She's Having Our Baby (1)
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine decide to try adoption but learn that their ages may complicate the process; a new secretary puts Luther and Dawber under her spell.

episodes.name: She's Having Our Baby (2)
episodes.overview: A pregnant women considers the Foxes as prospective adoptive parents for her baby; Luther and Dauber try to win over the rest of the Breakers' coaching staff.

episodes.name: Bo Knows
episodes.overview: The Breakers' prospect for winning games seem bleak until Hayden's star quarterback from Minnesota State shows an interest in joining the team.

episodes.name: Coach's Cornered
episodes.overview: After Doris fires the hostile host (Bakay) of her TV station's post-game show, she surprises Hayden by taking Luther's suggestion for a replacement: Christine.

episodes.name: Turtle World
episodes.overview: Hayden regrets sponsoring Luther's harebrained investment in ""Turtle World"" when he learns that the animals featured in the attraction are dying in captivity.

episodes.name: There's Got to Be a Mourning After (1)
episodes.overview: Luther muzzles his true feelings about the death of his beloved dog, Quincy, until Doris offers him some advice.

episodes.name: There's Got to Be a Mourning After (2)
episodes.overview: Hayden and Luther try to iron out their differences over Luther's relationship with Doris. Meanwhile, in spite of the team's losing season, the coaching staff perks up.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Burleigh (1)
episodes.overview: Hayden fumes when the Burleighs come for a surprise visit and then extend their stay.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Burleigh (2)
episodes.overview: While Hayden waffles over helping Howard search for a new job, the coaches see a window of opportunity for scoring their first win of the season.

episodes.name: The Tight End
episodes.overview: While Hayden's priority is the Breakers' first game of the season, Doris is concerned with re-signing a handsome washout (Wahlheim) so he can model a line of swimwear endorsed by the team -- and television commentators focus on the team's new sex symbol during a game.

episodes.name: Nice Guys Get Cut
episodes.overview: Hayden loses his appetite when Christine invites soon-to-be-fired player Matt Luba over for dinner.

episodes.name: Her Boyfriend's Back
episodes.overview: The father of the unborn baby whom Hayden and Christine plan to adopt comes back into Julie's life.

episodes.name: The Gardener
episodes.overview: Hayden must confront his inept gardener when all the plants in the yard start to die; but when Hayden fires him, he gets a chilly reception from Luther, who thinks the daffy worker deserved a second chance.

episodes.name: Patching Things Up
episodes.overview: Christine needs to cheer up Hayden after a doctor connects his diminished sex drive to "male menopause."

episodes.name: Save the Wave
episodes.overview: Hayden rallies support for the team after Doris decides to move the Breakers to Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Dauber's Vehicle
episodes.overview: Dauber turns a deaf ear to Hayden's advice while choosing a new car, and winds up with a model that he can't afford.

episodes.name: Quarantine
episodes.overview: When Luther's pet monkey bites Hayden, he, Howard and the rest of the coaching staff are quarantined for fear of an outbreak of some kind of "lethal monkey virus."

episodes.name: Van Damn vs. Fox
episodes.overview: When Luther burns himself at Hayden's barbecue, he skewers his host with a multimillion-dollar lawsuit for negligence.

episodes.name: Fantasy Camp
episodes.overview: Hayden kicks himself for agreeing to coach at a football "fantasy camp," but Luther and Dauber can't wait to have their team go up against his in the final game.

episodes.name: Luther Get Your Gun
episodes.overview: Luther gets a shot at impressing Doris's high-class friends when he claims to be an expert hunter.

episodes.name: A Player to Be Named Later
episodes.overview: Hayden fears he'll look like a dummy if he fumbles the Breakers' first-choice pick in the NFL draft. Cameos include Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones and receiver Keyshawn Johnson.

episodes.name: Somebody's Baby
episodes.overview: Adoption complications develop when Julie's father returns.

episodes.name: Sleepless in Orlando
episodes.overview: When Christine and baby Timothy both become ill, an exhausted Hayden has too much to do while preparing for an important game.

episodes.name: Just Short of the Goal
episodes.overview: When Hayden passes on the chance to write a memoir of his failures with the Breakers, Luther makes a play for writing it himself -- without Hayden's involvement -- then discovers the topic is living with losing.

episodes.name: Last Tango in Orlando
episodes.overview: When Doris brings in a gorgeous Brazilian soccer player to play kicker for the Breakers, Hayden is skeptical of his talent, while Luther becomes suspicious of his intentions towards Doris.

episodes.name: Isn't It Romantic?
episodes.overview: Hayden's plans for an evening of dinner and dancing go awry when Christine resists leaving their baby at home.

episodes.name: We Can Never Die
episodes.overview: Hayden and Christine ask the Burleighs to become Tim's legal guardians, but the eccentric couple's enthusiasm causes the Foxes to reconsider their request.

episodes.name: Grimmworld
episodes.overview: Dauber's fairy-tale romance with his new girlfriend is jeopardized when he begins to suspect that Hayden doesn't approve.

episodes.name: In the Money
episodes.overview: When Luther and Doris plan to get married, Howard plans a huge televised half-time wedding for them during the Breakers vs. Niners game. Unfortunately, Luther's new obsession with Doris' money causes some problems.

episodes.name: You Win Some, You Lose Some
episodes.overview: When Hayden and Christine made plans to celebrate Christmas in Minnesota, they never believed the Breakers had any chance of making it to the playoffs. But fate is with the team and it looks like Hayden will play the Bills in Buffalo instead of playing Santa to Tim on his first Christmas.

episodes.name: Wings Over Buffalo
episodes.overview: On their way to face the Buffalo Bills in a wild-card game, Luther's love of chicken wings saddles the Breakers with a severe case of food poisoning.

episodes.name: Somewhere Out There
episodes.overview: In this very special episode which analogizes nine years of relationships between friends and family, Dauber believes he is contacted by aliens, and he considers leaving the Breakers, Orlando and Earth.

episodes.name: A Boy and His Doll
episodes.overview: Howard and Shirley give Timothy a doll, but Luther feels the boy should have more masculine influences.

episodes.name: The Body Gardener
episodes.overview: When Hayden's former gardener Kenny is fired by the Breakers, the guilt-ridden coach writes him a glowing job recommendation. But Hayden comes to regret that generosity when his words earn Kenny a job as his personal bodyguard.

episodes.name: To Ski or Not to Ski
episodes.overview: When Doris invites the whole gang to spend Valentine's Day weekend at a ski resort she's thinking about buying, Hayden helps Christine conquer her fear of the slopes. Meanwhile, Dauber runs into his ex-fiancée Judy, which stirs some unresolved feelings. The gang heads off to a ski resort, where Hayden and Christine go their separate ways after an argument and Dauber spends his time trying to hide from Judy after spotting her in a grocery store.

episodes.name: It's a Swamp Thing
episodes.overview: When Hayden, Luther, Dauber and Howard decide to celebrate "Man Week" in the Florida Everglades, Doris, Christine and Shirley decide to take a vacation of their own. Meanwhile, having allowed Luther to plan their trip, the men wind up in swamp mud with an alligator.

episodes.name: Viva Las Ratings
episodes.overview: Luther plans to "invest" his life savings at an Elvis memorabilia auction in Las Vegas, but he gets into a heated bidding war with The Drew Carey Show's Mimi. In the end, Luther and Mimi go from bitter rivals to dance partners in a wild, Elvis-inspired dream sequence set to music.

episodes.name: A Fox By Any Other Name
episodes.overview: Hayden recalls how Tim got his name as a result of the coach's mishap with a hospital clerk, which led to a baby-naming contest sponsored by an antagonistic sportswriter.

episodes.name: The Stench of Death
episodes.overview: As a reward for the Breakers' successful season, Doris gives the coaches a session with her psychic, but Luther is troubled by the woman's prediction and convinces himself that a defensive tackle Hayden's trying to sign is out to kill him.

episodes.name: Baby Coaches
episodes.overview: Hayden's insecurity gets the better of him when an obnoxious mother boasts that her baby girl -- who's just a few days older than Tim -- can already walk and talk. So the coach tries to bring Tim up to speed.

episodes.name: Upsized
episodes.overview: Doris promotes Luther, leaving Hayden to find a new defensive coordinator, a job he thinks would be perfect for Dick Butkus -- until the former linebacker shows up and starts taking over.

episodes.name: The Neighbor Hood
episodes.overview: Skeptical Hayden warns Christine not to trust the new neighbors.

episodes.name: Leaving Orlando (1)
episodes.overview: In the first episode of the three-part series finale, Doris offers Hayden a 17-million-dollar package to stay with the Breakers for 10 years. When Hayden learns there are other teams in the league that want to lure him away, he and Christine plan to sneak off to the cabin to think things over

episodes.name: Leaving Orlando (2)
episodes.overview: Hayden, Luther and Dauber return to Minnesota State, where they reminisce about their college-coaching years and see some familiar faces. Later, at the lake with Christine and Tim, Hayden shares his vision of the family's future -- an idea she quickly embraces.

episodes.name: Leaving Orlando (3)
episodes.overview: Hayden, Luther and Dauber return to Minnesota State, where they reminisce about their college-coaching years and see some familiar faces. Later, at the lake with Christine and Tim, Hayden shares his vision of the family's futureâ€”an idea she quickly embraces.
